content.html: At Xamarin I left every day at 5pm and I prioritized a healthy life/work balance - and hope I lead my people that way. I think that asking people to work extra hours just give you low quality output. And in the context of these layoffs is crass.
content.value:
At Xamarin I left every day at 5pm and I prioritized a healthy life/work balance - and hope I lead my people that way. 

I think that asking people to work extra hours just give you low quality output.  And in the context of these layoffs is crass.
